name: HAGL (Hoang Anh) Plaza Da Nang

reviews.text: I've seen the hotel from the air as my plane approaches Danang Airport for landing on my many trips to Danang. It was my first stay with the HAGL Plaza Hotel in December 2010. My first evening there, the hotel was hosting the Christams Tree Lighting Ceremony and it invited its guests and local dignitaries to this event. Wines and beers were freely served by friendly employees. The planned foods ran out due to an enormous amount of people attending this event. Additional foods were brought down from the Top Floor lounge to accommodate the crowd. I really enjoyed meeting with the gregarious general manager and his local VIP guests. No one talked about the War, only us Americans still have not got over it. The local polticians and dignitaries talked about parties, good times, Cognacs of different types. No politics! Wow, what a different in 40 years when topics du jour were about bombing, killing, and war. Now business deals, cooperation, economic growth, are the topics. Anyway, I enjoyed being exposed to different perspectives and points of view.
reviews.title: Well managed property with friendly and attentive staff members

reviews.text: The room, a standard one to boot, has amenities that were not available to an average room in the States: slippers, robes, refrigerator, etc... The room was clean with daily service and pamper.
reviews.title: BEST HOTEL IN DA NANG

reviews.text: The breakfast in the hotel is very good with fresh baked goods made daily on the premise. i did not have lunch or dinner here to give correct review on the food service department. Based on my overall impression, I can assume that the restaurant provides good Western and Vietnamese entrees.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel , spacious room, clean toilet and excellent GM
Excellent Hospitality - GM Amir
reviews.text: The pool and spa facilities are superb with reasonable cost for massage and spa service. Just fraction as compared to the US prices. I highly recommend you take advantage of this. The pool was little green due to algae problem and the hotel is trying to correct it. Tennis courts were empty but I could not find anyone to play with. All was busy with shopping and partying!
The hotel locates so close to everything in Danang. I walked to the Central Market, Cho Han; to the Cham Museum; a mile-ride to the airport. Very convenient.
reviews.title: Best value and once again another wonderful stay (4 times this year)

reviews.text: We stayed for two nights to attend a relative's wedding. This hotel was the best out of the others we stayed at in other parts of Vietnam. True to its five star ratings, the hotel presented us with spotless, huge room with great amenities. The wooden floor was very clean and comfortable. The king bed was huge, perhaps not the usual asian sized king bed. The toilet was the best of all. You get an awesome rainbath standing shower and a separate bathtub which was pretty rare in Vietnam. The turndown service every day was great as well.
reviews.title: An excellent hotel

reviews.text: The service is also excellent. Warm hospitality shown by the General Manager (Mr Amir) himself and his team of staffs. They spoke fluent English, it was easy to communicate. We called for an adaptor and it was delivered in 5 minutes. The housekeeping staffs made it a point to greet every time they see you and check if you needed any amenities. Our room was on the 15th floor and we had a very pleasant view of the entire city. Wifi worked well enough to do some work from our room.
reviews.title: Large clean room and excellent service

reviews.text: Location is great, pretty close to Big C and exceptionally close to the Airport. The famous Pho24 chain was also only a 5 minutes walk away without having to cross any roads. Breakfast spread was not bad. There was live noodle and egg stations. We liked the variety of pastries and bread available.
reviews.title: Cherish An unforgettable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were on a golfing trip organized by Senior Golfers Society,Malaysia.Stayed 2 nights at the hotel.Apart from its central location it has an extra ordinary big rooms,very clean indeed. The staff were very friendly.We were specially taken care by the PR Officer of the hotel throughout the trip.
reviews.title: Expensive but worth it

reviews.text: The Hotel Manager En Amir was always there to ensure that we were well taken care.He even joined us for a seafood dinner on one of the night.He personally saw us off when we left.Great guy.Tqvm En Amir.
reviews.title: The best hotel i have stayed in the year 2010

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and older son stayed for one night and wished we could have stayed more, the staff helped out with travel arrangements and sightseeing transportation.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel with a great rooms and showers

reviews.text: Breakfast was nice, did the job and the bar on the top floor was very nice at night
reviews.title: Wonderful stay in this 5- star tastefully furnished hotel, with top rated service standard

reviews.text: We had a great time at the HAGL Plaza Danang Hotel. Its location was excellent - less than 10 mins to the Airport and within walking distance to a shopping mall and seafood restaurants. Hoi-an is less than an hour away.
reviews.title: Great place, Great GM

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms in HAGL Plaza were beautifully furnished with fresh clean sheets, and the service standard was top rated. Hotel GM, Mr Amir was a shining example. He was very helpful and attentive to details. His reception staff were efficient and check- in was a breeze. We are indeed grateful to Mr Amir who personally arranged the hotel shuttle to ferry our group to the Airport. Thank you for all your efforts.
reviews.title: Top notch Hotel in Da Nang

reviews.text: Well located with good eating, the city's administrative centre, and the airport minutes away. Would like to thank Mr Amir & his staff for making me feel welcome on my stay. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: wonderful experience

reviews.text: I stayed for 11 nights in January 2011 on the 19th floor. The view is good, an overview of Danang City. On a good clear day, you can see the beautiful mountains surrounding the city and the night scene is fanstatic. The restaurant on the top floor has a magnificient view. Good for photography or a cup of vietnamese coffee. The hotel room is clean and big. I requested for an iron and iron board and they were delivered to my room within a short time. Excellent service. Good location as it's within walking distance to the famous Market and Cham Museum. The counter staff are couteous. Amir, the General Manager is very friendly and noted that he walks aorund and talks to hotel guests. Will recommend this hotel to my firends visiting Danang.
reviews.title: A Hotel that I will recommend

reviews.text: The room is one of the largest I have ever been to. The service provided by the staff is fabulous.They are courteous and very helpful to say the least. Every night, you will return to your room filled with aroma from essential oil heating over a candle flame in the bath room. You will also find chocolates and orchid flower on your bed and in the bath room. The bathroom is really big and spacious. The location is in the heart of the city. It is about 5-10 minutes walk to the nearest big hyper mart known as Big-C, and an approximately 15 minutes walk from the Han River, where one can look at the beautiful night scenery from the riverside. The lounge located at 23rd floor offers a panoramic view of the whole Da Nang city. The breakfast selection offers a good spread, including Asian and Vietnamese selections.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Da Nang City!

reviews.text: HAGL is one of the larger hotels in Danang. It is positioned smack center of the busy district and it cuts all the hustle and bustle out the moment you step in. The reception was polite. The superior room we were given was generously large, with two large king sized beds. It features all the facilities of a hotel of its size and prestige. The toilets are similarly clean and spacious, boasting a separate shower and tub. However, the hotel itself seems rather aged, reminiscent of the corporate hotels of the 90s. And the wifi signal was rather weak and sporadic.
reviews.title: A large comfortable hotel but it left me wanting.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast buffet was fairly good, with a sizable spread of international and local dishes. There are also numerous foods stalls selling delicious foods once you step outside and turn right of the front main doors.
reviews.title: Spacious room with great service

reviews.text: The spa in the hotel left much to desire though. The staff there had a poor command of English which made communicating our choices rather tedious. The masseuses seemed rather young and unprofessional and I felt it was not quite worth what we had paid.
reviews.title: Lovely view from the sky view lounge and great service

aka: Hagl (Hoang Anh) Plaza Da Nang Hotel Da Nang
description: Ideal location only a mere 1.5 kms away from the Danang International airport. Well-appointed guests rooms backed with modern facilities and friendly staff to ensure that your stay is relaxing, comfortable. You are most welcome at the Hagl Plaza Danang!
